title: Ep 56 | Phil, Jase, and Al Compare Churches & Preaching Styles
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al talk about different churches and preaching styles. Phil diagnoses the problem with modern American churches. And in a classic moment, Phil doesn't realize he's being recorded.
